body:
Hi everybody,

i am having a look more or less for the first time to the Photovoltaic tools and i would like to ask you some questions to clarify the component and their use:

- what is the difference between the tools in honeybee and the ones in Ladybug?

- Few weeks ago i got an error and i found out it was a bug([http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1549722](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/xn/detail/2985220:Comment:1549722)). Has it been fixed?

Thanks a lot in advance

Claudia

replies.body:
Hi Claudia,

[Ladybug Photovoltaics](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-photovoltaics-components-released) components are based on [NREL PVWatts](http://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy14osti/60272.pdf) model.
[Honeybee Photovoltaics](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1350615) components are based on [Energy plus](http://bigladdersoftware.com/epx/docs/8-0/engineering-reference/page-111.html) model.

I am sure the author of Honeybee Photovoltaics will help you with your bug.

Hi Claudia, [It should be fixed](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/commit/0cb8c11ec49cc694b6f2bdad874e27e3f4966ba8) if you're using a newer version than June 10. Let us know if you can regenerate the error.

Hi Mostapha, thanks a lot for your quick reply and for your work with HoneyBee! I have just updated the components (mostly manually) and i still have this error: "1. Solution exception:extractPoints() takes at most 4 arguments (5 given)" which i don`'t understand. Do you know what could it be? Thanks a lot in advance Claudia
You need to update all the components. The error is because of version discrepancy.

Chris,

Thanks a lot for your advice!

I will try then to use those component from LadyBug!

Thanks again to all

Claudia

Hi Claudia,

If you downloaded the [Ladybug Photovoltaics](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/ladybug-photovoltaics-components-released) components and/or [examples files](https://app.box.com/s/zmnybht71kv21fxynn6k9hawj51fq5ok) today, please do that again.
I have just updated both of these to the latest versions.
I apologize if this caused you any inconveniences.
